name: SoulCalibur: Unbreakable Soul
storyline: Follow Cassandra and the Edge Master in search of fragments of the dreaded blade, Soul Edge. An all-new story unfolds as you acquire powerful weapons and avatars to aid your quest.
summary: SoulCalibur: Unbreakable Soul is an exclusive mobile-only title in the Soulcalibur franchise that mixes fighting combat and card-based battle tactics. Draw your sword and take to the arena of Soulcalibur high-fidelity 3D world, all with the touch of a single finger!
